snippet.title: Slash & Girl Android Gameplay
snippet.description:
Slash&Girl is an endless runner game in which you’ll play as Doris, a girl on a mission to fight off all the creepy clown invading earth

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE HD VIDEOS → https://goo.gl/Pz1CBK

Download | https://slashandgirl.en.uptodown.com/android?utm_source=youtube.com&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=traffic_ac
Google play | https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.slashandgirl.android

The game controls are similar to Subway Surfers (although they’re even more similar to the lesser-known Blades of Brim). Swipe to either side of the screen and your heroine will move in the same direction, attacking any enemies in the way. Similarly, swiping up will make Doris jump, or attack enemies directly in front of her.

Although you’ll start the game with just a couple weapons and only a few accessories for Doris, as you keep playing and winning coins you can unlock more than fifty different weapons, from traffic lights to lightsabers to chainsaws! On top of that, you can also unlock loads of clothes for Doris: pants, shorts, boots, gloves, and more!

Slash&Girl is an action-packed endless runner with precise controls and excellent graphics. Kill evil clowns and compete with other players for the best place on the game’s online scoreboards!

More games➡ https://en.uptodown.com/android?utm_source=youtube.com&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=traffic_ac
Telegram➡ https://t.me/uptodown_com
Twitter (english)➡ https://twitter.com/uptodown_en
Twitter (spanish)➡ https://twitter.com/uptodown

#slash&girl #android #androidgames
